issue.title: [R] Fix performance regression from cpp11::r_string
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10399](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10399). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
On a taxi CSV read demo, reading a data.frame went from ~7 seconds to ~30 seconds. One of the cpp11 changes was identified to be a cause, and reverting it recovered the lost performance.
